definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import datasignal ds.result = datasignal.axesnames(commonblock, "$var.detector", "$var.firstchannel", "$var.timers", "$var.mgchannels", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno", "$var.nexus_step_datasources", $(nchannelstoskip), "$var.scan_title", ds.$(msenv), "$(sardanasignal)", $(defaultattrs))
$datasources.$(msenv)
